description: Lists the things you have added to the given billing group. Requires permission to access the ListThingsInBillingGroup action.

parameters.name: billingGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the billing group.

nested_items.name: things
nested_items.description: A list of things in the billing group.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The token to use to get the next set of results. Will not be returned if operation has returned all results.
